Extension WPS Office.






















































 This extension allows users to easily adjust the brightness and background color of the WPS Office website. Using a simple and intuitive interface, you can control the brightness and change the background color to enhance readability and reduce eye strain while using the website.

Key Features:

Brightness Adjustment: Use the slider to adjust the brightness of the page from 50% to 200%, customizing the visual appearance to your preference.
Background Color Change: Choose any color from the color picker to change the background of the WPS Office website to your desired shade.
User-Friendly Interface: Quick and easy to use without disrupting your workflow. All options are accessible from the extension popup.
Lightweight: Minimal impact on browser performance, with fast and seamless adjustments in real-time.
How to Use:

Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Click on the extension icon in your browser toolbar.
Use the brightness slider or the color picker to customize your view of the WPS Office site.
Enjoy a more personalized browsing experience!
